item.title: Bias in AI
item.description: We put the artificial in artificial intelligence when it comes to statistics. We program robots to give us what we want, not representing our entire population. Letâ€™s use Aritificial Intelligence ethically and not incorporate bias in our alogorithms. Who knows, maybe in the future robots will keep an eye on us, detecting our flaws in bias. AI algorithms, also known as deep learning, find patterns in the data we collect.
